description: Try our easy to follow Preserved Lemons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Preserved Lemons Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Over the next 2-3 days, continue to press down on lemons to release juices. Lemons should be submerged in the salty liquid. Refrigerate jar for 1 month before using. The peel should now be very soft and translucent.
